title: IBreakCornerFeatureData.IGetEntities
description: Gets the faces or edges to which this break corner is applied.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of faces or edges of size count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IBreakCornerFeatureData::GetEntitiesCount
before calling this method. See Access Selections that Define Features for additional details on using this method.
